Hydras:

The male hissed and replied "Just two or three years ago, we suces=
fully introduced a spy there... but eventually he was discovered, and altou=
gh he managed to scape and capture a good hostage... He was discovered... i=
f oher spy have to go there.. then this must be planned carefully... kidnap=
ping a maximal and disguise the volunteer as it, or disguise the volunteer =
as maximal and behaves likes one... for at time, but if we do that we have =
to recreate a pod's arrival and we have the risk that Unicron decides to ca=
pture our spy... that're the ways that I suggest"

 April 28, 2005 10:53 PM

you look as if you have a plan in mind. I would like to hear

uld feel the start of her dreams of ridding herself of the
